name: Donte's Assessments
body:
### Welcome Message
![](http://playeressence.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/attack-on-titan-anime-banner-eren-600x360.jpg)

My name is Donte' Wilson and I've always dreamed of becoming apart of the gaming industry. I am currently attending AIE(Academy of Interactive Entertainment), there I hope to develop a greater understanding of game programming. Throughout my life I have played multiple games and I have observed how they work mechanically. This site will display the assessments I have completed and some of the work I have accomplished here at AIE.
### Assessments
All assessments that I have completed will be displayed on this site and available for download. I am currently in the process of editing my repository so it displays my information in an organized manner. There will be an easy and simple process of viewing my work.


### Authors and Contributors
Donte Wilson - Owner of Site.

### Contact Information
If you have questions about my work or progress, Contact me at donte.wilson@students.aie.edu.au
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
